summary: Open N files, each one in his own tab, like this:  :NTAB file1 file2 ... fileN
name: MultiTabs
description:
Open N files, each one in his own tab, like this: 
    :NTAB file1 file2 ... fileN

Synonyms:    :NTABS, :ETABS, TABS, OPENTABS

Enjoy.

Yakov Lerner
install_details:
1. Download the script and copy it into your ~/.vim/plugin directory.
2. If ~/.vim/plugin directory does not exist, create it using command:
                          mkdir -p ~/.vim/plugin directory.
3. Restart vim.
